content: toddler owl purse pattern this is a free pattern please do not sell or redistribute this pattern please credit the craftzilla for the pattern when selling/displaying your final products thank you **important note about sizing ** i m using bernat softee baby yarn in mint and lavender it is a thinner yarn than average so your purses will turn out bigger in a larger/thicker weight yarn these are big enough to stick an adult fist into with this yarn pattern http //thecraftzilla blogspot com/2016/06/owl-purse-pattern html 1 please feel free to message me on facebook or email me with any questions or corrections thank you rachel from the craftzilla thecraftzilla@gmail com 2 https //www facebook com/thecraftzilla 3 1 http //thecraftzilla blogspot com/2016/06/owl-purse-pattern html 2 thecraftzilla@gmail com 3 https //www facebook com/thecraftzilla
